column5: I officially became a Grampa at 8.02pm this evening 8.5lbs Baby Boy  l think l have a new fishing partner look out fish here he comes   Mother & Son doing great... Father " Well that is a different Story"
Good news. Congrats
Congrats!
congratulations!!
Good job gramps
Congrats!!!
Congrats on the new 'tinytoon'
Congrats!
well done, now you can make your own children feel neglected like my parents do lol the grandkids are more important than anything and everything to them now hahaha
I saw a bumper sticker once that said "If there is life after death I want to come back as my parents grandchild". Congrats.
Congrats!!!
CONGRATS LT!!
There's no life like it.
Congrats to you and your family!

a little personal story about grandkids...  I caught a severe bout of food poisoning earlier this year and was on day 2 of 3 of literally living a life of upchucking and passing out just barely managing to stay hydrated. I was staying at my parents house and my mom came to check up on me and i asked for her to possibly bring me some plain crackers to try get some food back into my system. She brought me some old-garbage stale crackers and said "thats all ive got sorry" i eat them reluctantly...a day later i emerge from my room mustering the strength to make it to the kitchen i look for more crackers and what do i see but a brand new box of cheese nips...i ask my mom what the hell is this? i thought you said we had no crackers?! you made me eat those disgusting ones! her reply "those are for the grandkids"
Grandkids are fun. When they're not, you get to return them. Congratulations.
Yep. All my parents Grandchildren are spending my inheritance. However I'd rather they see someone enjoy it while they are still alive.
Grandkids are fun. When they're not, you get to return them. Congratulations.   YUP,,,,,,,,,,,,,,, LOL  Grats Kelvin.
congrats Kelvin!
Welcome to the club!

Thanks everyone for the great response... Got back up there this day and the nurses asked if l was moving in  why do you have extra space for me to be with my daughter and grandson  sorry could not resist
Congrats Kelvin  If Maribeth and I had known that grandkids were so much fun...We would have had them first !
Congrats! Best part is the free license that comes with the kid. Finally tax dollars going to good use!

Congrats! Best part is the free license that comes with the kid. Finally tax dollars going to good use! The kids do not need a thing both have great jobs... even told me that l can not buy any thing for them  not buying for them.. my daughter forgets who l am   can not tell me anything   I Am GRAMPA any thing goes  She is going to kill me  she will never learn
